title: Is block 36 allowed for map making?

replies.body:
Well what are you using it for?
And people who don't know what block 36 is. Its a block no one can see or pass through.

replies.body: im not sure yet, i think im gonna sue it for ladders..if ya know what i mean

replies.body: Once I reported a person for fly hacking because he was rising up in the air, then I realized he was climbing a ladder connected to 36 and I didn't see the ladder on the other side -.-'

replies.body: Don't see why not they are used on volcano, for ladders. Being allowed to use block 36 is all a matter of what purpose you are using in for.
replies.body_tagged: Don't see why not they are used on volcano, for ladders. Being allowed to use block 36 is all a matter of what purpose you are using in for.

replies.body: they are if you just want to use them for stuff like ladders, but if you use them to like block the spawn...hehe....good luck...
replies.body_tagged: they are if you just want to use them for stuff like ladders, but if you use them to like block the spawn...hehe....good luck...

replies.body: If you want floating ladders, you can make a ladder on a wall normally, then use //fast and //set 0 on the blocks behind the ladder. Much cleaner way to do this without using block 36.
replies.body_tagged: If you want floating ladders, you can make a ladder on a wall normally, then use //fast and //set 0 on the blocks behind the ladder. Much cleaner way to do this without using block 36.
